block.p: KOOCK-Betty (nee Geffen). Of Copley, Ohio, on Monday October 2, 2000. Beloved wife of Julian C. Devoted mother of Marjorie and Charles Isroff and Kenneth and Cristine Koock. Loving grandmother of Bradley and Jason Isroff, Jessica Koock and Felisa and Michael DiSanto. Adoring greatgrandmother of Phaelan Koock. Graveside service Thursday, October 5, at 1 P.M. in the Beth Israel Memorial Park, Woodridge, N.J. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to B'Nai Brith women.
